content: finishing work chart b an additional two times the six stitch finish as for dk version using more strands of yarn to repeat area will be worked an additional 2 times each make tassel sample uses 40 strands which are then time the chart is worked 90 sts doubled over work the first two row only of chart c the six stitch repeat will be worked 9 times 92 sts joining row 1 knit to one stitch before end purl last stitch of row together with first stitch of row to join and work in the round make sure not to twist place marker to signify end of round 91 sts round 2 purl to end autonomy cowl - 4 rosemary romi hill finishing - tassel 5 cut strands at one end pictures illustrate the finishing instructions for making a tassel 1 cut a 10 inch length of yarn fold in half and then secure to tip of cowl this shows a crochet hook being used to pull a loop through the point 6 center and lay tassel yarn across two lengths of hanging yarn under knot with one strand laying on top of tassel lengths tie hanging lengths of yarn tight and securely around the center of the tassel yarn in a double knot 2 pass ends are through loop to secure yarn to the tip of cowl 7 fold tassel yarn down to hide knot inside tassel 3 there are now 3 lengths of yarn hanging from bottom tip of cowl knot all three strands together as close to the tip as possible and tighten 8 cut another 10 inch length of yarn and use it to tie the tassel approximately 1/2 to 1 inch down from top 4 to add tassel wrap yarn around cardboard about 24-30 times in this case i m using a shawl pin box to get strands of yarn appoximately 7 inches long autonomy cowl - 5 rosemary romi hill finishing - tassel cont 13 smooth tassel down and then wrap tape around bottom of tassel right above point of desired length using tape as a 9 once the yarn is tied on one side of the tassel flip over to guide trim tassel remove tape and neaten up tassel if the other side and tie again with a double knot needed 10 thread ends of tie into blunt tapestry needle 11 thread both ends into the center of the tassel 12 pull ends through completely into the middle of the tassel so that they re hidden autonomy cowl - 6 rosemary romi hill
